entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 7:39 PM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon.
